description: This file defines a Helpers class with static methods for managing application layout configurations and updating page settings in a Laravel PHP project.

classes.name: Helpers
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods to generate application layout classes and update page configuration settings.

methods.name: applClasses
methods.description: Generates and returns an array of layout class configurations based on default settings, environment, and project config.

methods.name: updatePageConfig
methods.description: Updates the application's page configuration settings with provided configuration array.
